node.display_long_description:
Season 2 of Echo Pass is now open! Free to all players, jump and compete in order to earn new Echo Points to unlock exciting rewards. Or upgrade to a premium Echo Pass to triple the amount of rewards earned throughout the Season. 

A premium Echo Pass can be unlocked by purchasing “Echo Points” in-game or through Oculus DLC. Players can currently redeem Echo Points in a couple different ways, and players can expect more ways to redeem their Echo Points coming later this year! 

Season 2 ends August 22 so jump in today! For more info, check out the Oculus Blog.

---
Experience the freedom of zero-g movement and high energy competition in Echo VR! Team up with friends and clash against AI or opposing Echo Units in the Echo Arena. 

To find links to feedback and bug report forms as well as a great place to discuss your experience with the developers and other players go to the Echo Games Discord, https://discord.com/invite/vXbazs5

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
A patch has just gone live to implement the following: 

Fix for standard chassis not applying correctly to all Echo Units. 
Fixed the order of the spectator cam hotkeys. 
Fix for the weapons detaching when moving in-and-out of combat areas. 
General preparations for Echo Pass Season 2 (hype!).

node.display_short_description: Jumping into Echo Pass Season 2? Earn Tier Experience Points (TXP) by playing matches, or purchase Echo Points to quickly unlock Echo Pass Tiers for exciting rewards. Players can redeem Echo Points in a couple different ways: ● Unlocking access to the Premium Echo Pass via the Customization Terminal—the Premium Echo Pass costs 1,000 Echo Points ● Premium Echo Pass users can then purchase tiers of the Echo Pass—each tier costs 200 Echo Points. More ways to redeem points coming later this year!

purchase_alerts.message: 这是附加内容，需要有主游戏 (Echo VR) 才能玩

nodes.title: Echo Pass Season 2 is live!
nodes.body_text:
Echo Pass Season 2 is live!
Log in today to start unlocking your rewards and outfitting your Echo Unit with our latest customization options. Season 2 will end on August 22 at 10:30AM PT.

What is Echo Pass? Echo Pass features a brand new reward track available to all Echo VR players to unlock rewards throughout the season, with the option to convert to Premium and unlock additional rewards.

nodes.title: Crossplay is now available in our Open Beta for Echo VR on Quest.
nodes.body_text: Echo Units who own an Oculus Quest or Oculus Rift can team up and compete for glory in zero-g together!

node.reviewDescription:
If your a parent looking at reviews to see if this game is good for your child or children or even you, then this is the review you want to read. I will tell you what you do in this game, the good things about the game, and the bad. 

WHAT YOU DO IN ECHO VR: If you know how soccer works, then you will see that this game is really similar. It’s 2 teams and 1 disk. You have to throw the disk in the other teams goal. So if your on blue team, you have to get the disk in the Orange goal. If your on the orange team, you have to get the disk in the blue goal. You can also just hang out in the lobby to practice throwing, making new friends, customize you character, etc. 

GOOD THINGS ABOUT ECHO VR: 
1. You can make friends.

2. You can mute others if you don’t want to talk to them or for you child/ children’s safety. 

3. It’s entertaining and can let time fly by.

4. Its FREE 

5. This game has no hackers, and if echo vr does have hackers, then the moderators will look at the logs and ban them. 

6. If you are still lost and not knowing how to do certain things, then don’t worry because you can do the tutorial more than once. (I forgot to
Mention that you will automatically be given a tutorial before you actually start playing. It’s pretty helpful.)

7. You can choose to be in a match with real people which is called a public match, or you can be in a AI match which is just playing with computers/ bots, or you can be in a Co-Op match which is just being on a team with real players and competing with bots. You can also choose the difficulty for AI matches. 

THE BAD THINGS ABOUT ECHO VR:
1. People DO use bad language 

2. People are sometimes inappropriate (which can be harmful to your kids)

3. People bully children even for unnecessary reasons (can lead to depression, lack of eating, suicide, etc) 

4. In a match, people sometimes like to self goal. In other words, the team your on, the same team scores in your goal. So for example, your on blue team and some random person that’s on the same team as you scores in the blue goal on purpose. (If your new to this game and thing that’s it’s no big deal, then your SO WRONG. It’s a big a big deal to us players because what that does is that your stats gets ruined. Like me personally, I’m a lvl 51 and I had a streak of 97 games won in a row and some JERK self goals. That may not be a problem for you, but when they do that, all it’s doing is wasting your time
For your concern.)

CONCLUSION: In the end, This game is really good for people who is over 12 or 13. Sometimes I hear VERY young kids play this game and who get bullied and even cry. I mean think about it, the game rating is Teen for a reason. If it wasn’t for all the bullying, language, sexual comments, racism, then I know for a fact that this game would be rated 10+. 

HOPEFULLY THIS WAS HELPFUL!!

(Btw If you know me in game, let me know that you saw my review bc lots of people say thy have seen me in matches or in the lobby but I don’t even know half of the people who me😂)
node.reviewTitle: MUST READ IF YOU ARE A PARENT!!

website_page_meta.description:
Season 2 of Echo Pass is now open! Earn new Echo Points to unlock exciting rewards. 
Experience the freedom of zero-g movement and high energy competition in Echo VR! Load into the Echo VR social lobby to meet up with friends and customize your chassis before clashing against AI or opposing Echo Units in the Echo Arena.

To find links to feedback and bug report forms go to the Echo Games Discord, https://discord.com/invite/vXbazs5
